attributes.action: look at the ideas and suggestions suggestion in my earlier e mails and suggest perhaps the following ...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Further to the maternity related petitions already visible on the UK govt website, Example -  http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/mumstermtimework/

I would like to petition the govt to foster more opportunities for working  mothers (particularly primagravidae) by :

1. Accrediting officially home - working opportunities
2. Commissioning the design of a "working mums" web site (I could do that) where none at present currently exist
3. Encouraging A4E job centre plus to liaise with Midwives on Mums plus one and maternity rights booklets (all free)

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
